column1: '''Michael Nickles''' is a German programmer<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/kleinehobbit.html Der Kleine Hobbit] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 5 September 2010)</ref> and the author of the German Text-Adventure ''[[Der Kleine Hobbit]]''.<ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQS
